simple = "simple string"

escaped = "\
a simple string with explicit escapes\
"

not_escaped = """
a special string to prevent explicit escaping
"""

formated = f"Hello, {name}!\n"
bin = b'?h|\x85\x95\x95\x87\x950\xa6\xa8\xc0\x06+\x15c'

pyh: str="Hello, World\n"
jsh = "Hello, World\n"
char* cch = "Hello, World\n";

def pyf(x: int, y: int) -> int:
  return x+y

function jsf(x,y) {
  return x+y;
}

int ccf(int x, int y) {
  return x+y;
}
